level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to establish administrative rules and procedures for the implementation of the Automobile Consumer Protection Act of 1984 (Act).

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง 10 of the Automobile Consumer Protection Act of 1984, D.C. Law 5-162, D.C. Code ยง 50-508 (2001).

level.heading: EDITOR’S NOTE
level.text: Section 811 of D.C. Law 11-52 amended the Automobile Consumer Protection Act of 1984 by suspending enforcement of the act by the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs until October 1, 1998 (D.C. Official Code ยง50-501 et seq. (2001)).
